goal:
C@rma 's mission is to foster dialogue between Private sector and civil society in Turkey.
We inspire and mobilise corporate professionals to use their skills to support Turkish Civil Organisations ("Pro Bono").

We are conducting diagnostics of the needs of the NGOs and identifying correct ways to provide them the needed skills. It can be through our platform (www.4carma.com), through brainstorming sessions with experts or through long term projects.

We are also organising different events to bring visibility to NGos and give the opportunity to corporate professionals to discover the Civil Society world.

We are mainly active in Istanbul but are expanding our reach now throughout Turkey.

Since June 2016 we are also supporting groups of disadvantaged women (mainly refugees) to set up their businesses.
